title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Clear answers about my development process, pricing, and how I can help build your next project.
metaDescription: Common questions about custom web app development, Next.js projects, pricing, and timelines. Direct answers from a specialized freelance developer.
metaKeywords: freelance web developer, custom web app cost, Next.js developer, react freelancer, web development pricing, website vs web app, AlecsDesign FAQ
tryDifferentKeywords: Try using different keywords or browse all questions below.
contactPrompt: Have a specific question about your project? Email me directly.

questions.question: Are you an agency or a freelancer?
questions.answer: I am a specialized freelance developer. When you work with me, you communicate directly with the person writing your code, not a project manager. This means faster feedback loops, lower costs (no agency overhead), and a personal commitment to your project''s success. I handle the full stack: from the visual interface to the database logic.

questions.question: What is the difference between a Website and a Web App?
questions.answer: Think of a website as a digital brochureit gives information (like a restaurant menu). A web app is a toolit does things (like a Tax Calculator, a Booking System, or a Dashboard). I specialize in building high-performance Web Apps using React and Next.js, which feel like mobile apps but run in your browser.

questions.question: How much does a project cost?
questions.answer: Since I am a freelancer, my rates are typically 30-40% lower than agencies for the same quality of code. A standard informational site starts around 800. Custom Web Apps (like calculators, dashboards, or SaaS tools) typically range from 2,000 to 5,000 depending on the logic required. I provide a fixed-price quote upfront so there are no surprises.

questions.question: How long does it take to build?
questions.answer: Because I don''t have corporate red tape, I move fast. A standard project takes 2-4 weeks. Complex applications (like the ISEE Simulator) may take 4-8 weeks to ensure the math and logic are perfect. I will give you a realistic timeline during our first call and update you weekly.

questions.question: What technology do you use?
questions.answer: I don''t use outdated WordPress templates. I build with the modern stack used by top tech companies: React & Next.js for the interface, TypeScript for bug-free logic, and Tailwind CSS for pixel-perfect design. This ensures your site is incredibly fast, secure, and ready for the future.

questions.question: Can you modernize my old website?
questions.answer: Absolutely. I specialize in taking old, slow websites and rebuilding them into modern Web Apps. For example, if you have a PDF form on your site that clients have to print and sign, I can turn that into a digital Interactive Wizard that calculates results instantly and generates a PDF automatically.

questions.question: Do you offer maintenance after launch?
questions.answer: Yes, but I don''t lock you into expensive contracts. I offer a 30-day warranty where I fix any bugs for free. After that, you can hire me on an hourly basis for updates, or pay a small monthly retainer (50-100) if you want me to handle hosting updates and technical health checks regularly.

questions.question: Will I own the code?
questions.answer: 100% Yes. Unlike website builders (Wix, Squarespace) where you rent your site, here you own the asset. I deliver the source code via GitHub. You are free to host it anywhere, modify it, or take it to another developer in the future. No vendor lock-in.

questions.question: Do you work with clients internationally?
questions.answer: Yes. I work remotely with clients across Europe. I am fluent in English, Italian, and Romanian, so we can communicate in the language you are most comfortable with. We can handle meetings via Google Meet or Zoom.

questions.question: How does payment work?
questions.answer: I split payments to keep it fair for both of us: 50% upfront to book my time and start development, and the remaining 50% upon completion when you are happy with the result and ready to launch. I accept Bank Transfer, PayPal, or Stripe.

questions.question: Can you handle SEO and Hosting?
questions.answer: Yes. I build sites with Technical SEO in mind (using Next.js Server Side Rendering) so Google can read them easily. I also handle the deployment to platforms like Vercel, connect your domain, and set up your SSL (HTTPS) certificate so your site is secure from day one.

questions.question: What do I need to provide to get started?
questions.answer: Just your idea and your goals! If you have text and images, that''s great. If not, I can help you structure the content. If you have a specific design in mind, I can build it. If you don''t, I can design a clean, modern interface for you.
